13
14#ifndef DNS_RRITERATOR_H
15#define DNS_RRITERATOR_H 1
16
17/*****
18 ***** Module Info
19 *****/
20
21/*! \file dns/rriterator.h
22 * \brief
23 * Functions for "walking" a zone database, visiting each RR or RRset in turn.
24 */
25
26/*****
27 ***** Imports
28 *****/
29
30#include <inttypes.h>
31
32#include <isc/lang.h>
33#include <isc/magic.h>
34#include <isc/stdtime.h>
35
36#include <dns/db.h>
37#include <dns/dbiterator.h>
38#include <dns/fixedname.h>
39#include <dns/name.h>
40#include <dns/rdata.h>
41#include <dns/rdataset.h>
42#include <dns/rdatasetiter.h>
43#include <dns/types.h>
44
45ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
46
47/*****
48 ***** Types
49 *****/
50
51/*%
52 * A dns_rriterator_t is an iterator that iterates over an entire database,
53 * returning one RR at a time, in some arbitrary order.
54 */
55
56typedef struct dns_rriterator {
57 unsigned int magic;
58 isc_result_t result;
59 dns_db_t *db;
60 dns_dbiterator_t *dbit;
61 dns_dbversion_t *ver;
62 isc_stdtime_t now;
63 dns_dbnode_t *node;
64 dns_fixedname_t fixedname;
65 dns_rdatasetiter_t *rdatasetit;
66 dns_rdataset_t rdataset;
67 dns_rdata_t rdata;
68} dns_rriterator_t;
69
70#define RRITERATOR_MAGIC ISC_MAGIC('R', 'R', 'I', 't')
71#define VALID_RRITERATOR(m) ISC_MAGIC_VALID(m, RRITERATOR_MAGIC)
72
73isc_result_t
74dns_rriterator_init(dns_rriterator_t *it, dns_db_t *db,
75 dns_dbversion_t *ver, isc_stdtime_t now);
76/*%
77 * Initialize an rriterator; sets the cursor to the origin node
78 * of the database.
79 *
80 * Requires:
81 *
82 * \li 'db' is a valid database.
83 *
84 * Returns:
85 *
86 * \li #ISC_R_SUCCESS
87 * \li #ISC_R_NOMEMORY
88 */
89
90isc_result_t
91dns_rriterator_first(dns_rriterator_t *it);
92/*%<
93 * Move the rriterator cursor to the first rdata in the database.
94 *
95 * Requires:
96 *\li 'it' is a valid, initialized rriterator
97 *
98 * Returns:
99 *\li #ISC_R_SUCCESS
100 *\li #ISC_R_NOMORE There are no rdata in the set.
101 */
102
103isc_result_t
104dns_rriterator_nextrrset(dns_rriterator_t *it);
105/*%<
106 * Move the rriterator cursor to the next rrset in the database,
107 * skipping over any remaining records that have the same rdatatype
108 * as the current one.
109 *
110 * Requires:
111 *\li 'it' is a valid, initialized rriterator
112 *
113 * Returns:
114 *\li #ISC_R_SUCCESS
115 *\li #ISC_R_NOMORE No more rrsets in the database
116 */
117
118isc_result_t
119dns_rriterator_next(dns_rriterator_t *it);
120/*%<
121 * Move the rriterator cursor to the next rrset in the database,
122 * skipping over any remaining records that have the same rdatatype
123 * as the current one.
124 *
125 * Requires:
126 *\li 'it' is a valid, initialized rriterator
127 *
128 * Returns:
129 *\li #ISC_R_SUCCESS
130 *\li #ISC_R_NOMORE No more records in the database
131 */
132
133void
134dns_rriterator_current(dns_rriterator_t *it, dns_name_t **name,
135 uint32_t *ttl, dns_rdataset_t **rdataset,
136 dns_rdata_t **rdata);
137/*%<
138 * Make '*name' refer to the current name. If 'rdataset' is not NULL,
139 * make '*rdataset' refer to the current * rdataset. If '*rdata' is not
140 * NULL, make '*rdata' refer to the current record.
141 *
142 * Requires:
143 *\li '*name' is a valid name object
144 *\li 'rdataset' is NULL or '*rdataset' is NULL
145 *\li 'rdata' is NULL or '*rdata' is NULL
146 *
147 * Ensures:
148 *\li 'rdata' refers to the rdata at the rdata cursor location of
149 *\li 'rdataset'.
150 */
151
152void
153dns_rriterator_pause(dns_rriterator_t *it);
154/*%<
155 * Pause rriterator. Frees any locks held by the database iterator.
156 * Callers should use this routine any time they are not going to
157 * execute another rriterator method in the immediate future.
158 *
159 * Requires:
160 *\li 'it' is a valid iterator.
161 *
162 * Ensures:
163 *\li Any database locks being held for efficiency of iterator access are
164 * released.
165 */
166
167void
168dns_rriterator_destroy(dns_rriterator_t *it);
169/*%<
170 * Shut down and free resources in rriterator 'it'.
171 *
172 * Requires:
173 *
174 *\li 'it' is a valid iterator.
175 *
176 * Ensures:
177 *
178 *\li All resources used by the rriterator are freed.
179 */
180
181ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
182
183#endif /* DNS_RRITERATOR_H */
184
